events.name: Madison Startup Weekend
events.about:
Startup Weekend is an intense 54 hour event which focuses on building a web or mobile application which could form the basis of a credible business over the course of a weekend. The weekend brings together people with different skillsets - primarily software developers, graphics designers and business people - to build applications and develop a commercial case around them. 

Startup Weekend Madison will take place the weekend of April 27-29, 2012 and will be held at the Madison College - West Campus. 

Why should you attend?
- Find a team to make your dream project come to life
- Find an awesome project to work on
- Delicious meals and snacks included for the entire weekend
- Get mentorship and advice from experienced entrepreneurs
- Compete for prizes
- Be part of a unique, energetic, and fun experience 

Registration is now open!
